name: Hell's Gate (Aaron Wise)
description:
Platform games (often simplified as platformer, or jump 'n' run) are a video game genre and subgenre of action games. Platformers are characterized by their heavy use of jumping and climbing to navigate the player's environment and reach their goal. In Hell's gate, you have abilities that are used with the 1, 2 & 3 keys of your keyboard. Anti gravity, Slow Mo & Super Speed allow you to overcome the obstacles in your path & achieve your goal.

Collect keys & Skulls in game to unlock Doors & unlock new worlds with new challenges & new music. Made in the Unreal Engine, I wanted to create something that took me back to my childhood when growing up with games like, Crash Bandicoot, Gex & others. 

Controls:

A & D - Move left & right
Space bar - Jump
Num 1 - Slow motion ability
Num 2 - Anti Gravity
Num 3 - Super Speed

Instructions are available in game. Use them if you want to be able to complete the game.
